text: Kateřina Valachová (born 15 September 1976) is a Czech politician and lawyer who served as Minister of Education, Youth and Sports of the Czech Republic in the Cabinet of Bohuslav Sobotka from 2015 to 2017. Valachová has also been a member of the Chamber of Deputies since October 2017. == References == ==External links== * Official twitter Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Education ministers of the Czech Republic Category:People from Brno Category:Czech Social Democratic Party Government ministers Category:Czech lawyers Category:Masaryk University alumni Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies of the Czech Republic (2017–2021)
title: Kateřina Valachová
